input.editor_field:
300ml water tank
Up to 300ml water tank helps you clean the whole mouth without having to refill.
3 modes efficient clean teeth
The Cordless Advanced includes 3 pressure settings allowing you to personalize your water pressure intensity.
High intensity pulsed
The Waterpik Cordless Advanced Water Flosser provides a unique combination of water pressure and pulsations to clean deep between teeth and below the gumline, removing plaque and debris that traditional brushing and flossing can't reach.


IPX7 waterproof level
It also features a waterproof design for use in the shower, 4 hour rapid charge.


Specs
Dimensions: 4 x 2.8 x 11.6 inches; 12.8 Ounces
DO NOT WASH
Store In A Cool, Dry Place
Gently Wipe To Remove Dust
Due to variations of light and color settings of computer/personal device screens, colors may appear slightly different from photographic images
Due to the manufacturing process, sizes of items listed in descriptions are approximate and actual size may vary slightly
